items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: A fast and lightweight desktop app built with Tauri (Rust) and React + Vite, featuring local CRUD operations with SQLite. Cross-platform, secure, and ideal for offline-first use cases.
items.title: atsed27/tauri-rust--react-desktop-app: A fast and lightweight desktop app built with Tauri (Rust) and React + Vite, featuring local CRUD operations with SQLite. Cross-platform, secure, and ideal for offline-first use cases.

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: The Starmus Audio Recorder is a lightweight, front-end WordPress plugin that allows users to record audio directly in the browser using the MediaRecorder API.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.
items.title: Just-Cr8if/tapd-react-sdk: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.

items.title: birchill/bugsnag-zero: Lightweight Bugsnag client

items.content_html: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
items.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

items.content_html: A lightweight, blazing-fast TypeScript library for calculating distances between two coordinates using the Haversine formula. Supports both kilometers and miles.
items.title: cdeshpa2/geo-utils: A lightweight, blazing-fast TypeScript library for calculating distances between two coordinates using the Haversine formula. Supports both kilometers and miles.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that renders Jianpu (numbered notation) from MusicXML or JSON to SVG/CANVAS. Features dynamic layout, interactivity, and real-time updates for web music apps.
items.title: flufy3d/JianpuRender: A lightweight TypeScript library that renders Jianpu (numbered notation) from MusicXML or JSON to SVG/CANVAS. Features dynamic layout, interactivity, and real-time updates for web music apps.
